Package model

Class Booking

java.lang.Object
model.Booking
public class Booking extends Object
Represents Booking objects for shows. The user can create bookings for performances at the theatre. Some of the properties are user defined.
Author:
Conan

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Booking()
    Empty constructor for Booking class
    Booking(int playId, int seatType, int seatNumber, int concession, int isPostal)
    User facing constructor for Booking class, takes user data which can be used to create Booking objects which can be used in the basket class
    Booking(int bookingId, int playId, int customerId, int seatType, int seatNumber, int concession, int isPostal)
    Database facing constructor which creates a Booking object from the Booking table in the database
